title: Hour3-  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour3-  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
description:
Doug and TJ in for Dan  Reacting to the interview Deshaun Watson did over the weekend when he admitted to being "truly sorry", Doug and TJ discuss whether Watson comes off as believable.  Former NFL team executive Andrew Brandt joins the guys to discuss Lamar Jackson's contract situation, the pending Deshaun Watson NFL appeal decision, and other relevant business around the NFL.  TJ and Doug close by talking about their one eating vice.  

#DougGottliebShow  #UpOnGame

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
